typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MeterCode as string,
		Serial as string,
		PlantCode as string,
		DateTime as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		Quality as string,
		Stream as string,
		DataType as string,
		Energy as double '###,###,###,###.###',
		Units as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	purgeFiles: true,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> GetDataFromBlob
GetDataFromBlob aggregate(groupBy(MeterCode,
		DateTime,
		DataType),
	MedianValue = round(mean({Energy}))
,
		MaximumValue = round(max({Energy}))
,
		MinimumValue = round(min({Energy}))
) ~> AggregateTheSource
AggregateTheSource sink(input(
		Id as integer,
		Date as date,
		MeterCode as string,
		DataType as string,
		AverageValue as double,
		MinimumValue as double,
		MaximumValue as double,
		MedianValue as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false) ~> ERMSink
